title: I’ll Divorce My Tyrant Husband - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Empires   European Ambience   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Manipulative Characters   Mob Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Power Couple   Power Struggle   Revenge   Royalty   Saints   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*aves   Slow Romance   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 오윤하
description:
I possessed of the Empress in the novel of Rofan.

Isn’t that good thing?

The problem is that the Empress is a supporting character who will be pushed off the throne by the cunning Emperor, then eventually dies of illness.

Like the original empress, I couldn’t die in the cold valley, waiting for my love to come.

But I couldn’t die. I’ve to be villain to get divorced.

As if to destroy the national treasury, lavished the luxury, talked in front of others, and harassed my husband.

By the way, the more I behave, the more obsessed he becomes.

Are you a pervert?!>
